figmaSpecs.name: Concept 1: Minimalist Modern - A sleek login form with a full-screen background image, featuring a semi-transparent card for input fields. The card includes a bold logo at the top, simple input fields with floating labels, and a prominent 'Login' button in a vibrant color to attract attention.
